document.full_text: mohamed bin hammam will face an ethics investigation just days before he is due to challenge sepp blatter for the fifa presidency after a report from within the organization's executive committee alleged possible bribery.
document.title: bin hammam and warner face fifa ethics probe
lines_and_colors: mohamed bin hammam will face an ethics investigation just days before he is due to challenge sepp blatter for the fifa presidency after a report from within the organization's executive committee alleged possible bribery.
